email_text:
Dear [Passenger Name],

Thank you for booking your upcoming flight with Delta Airlines. Below is your itinerary confirmation with the flight details:

Flight Details:
- Booking Reference: ABC123
- Flight Number: DL456
- Departure City: New York (JFK)
- Arrival City: Los Angeles (LAX)
- Departure Date: January 15th, 2023
- Departure Time: 9:00 AM
- Arrival Time: 12:00 PM
- Seat Number: 15A
- Baggage Allowance: 1 checked bag, 1 carry-on bag

Please click on the following link to check-in for your flight: [Check-in Link]

We look forward to welcoming you onboard and wish you a pleasant flight experience with Delta Airlines. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Safe travels,

Delta Airlines Team
